description:
The xPSDesiredStateConfiguration module is a part of the Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) Resource Kit, which is a collection of DSC Resources produced by the PowerShell Team. This module contains the xDscWebService resource that makes a node a DSC Pull Server
	xPSDesiredStateConfiguration is the new official name and the new package has been added as dependency.
	This package has been deprecated due to that change and to follow the rules about the forbidden '.' in the id name in chocolatey
displayName: [Deprecated] xPSDesiredStateConfiguration Module – PowerShell DSC Resource Kit
summary: This package has been deprecated due to a bad id and the change of the official name
author: PowerShell Team
